message: Let's split 70/30. It's a good deal for you in the first round considering the inflation.
I'm offering a 60/40 split in my favor. It's a fairer deal considering the inflation will hurt you more than me.
The inflation is working against both of us. I'll come down a little to 65/35. Let's be sensible and close this out.
I'm willing to compromise a bit more, but I need to make sure I get a fair share. How about a 55/45 split? It's still a good deal for you considering the inflation.
Bob, we're running out of time and the money's losing value fast. 60/40 is my final offer.  Take it or leave it.
